descriptionHtml:
Hi there,

as a big fan of Margaret Weis and Tracy Hickman and the amazing Dragonlance epos, here is my attempt to create  
the kender Tolpan Barfoot from the Dragonlance books. Now i find, he looks so nice, so i would like
to share him to the Nexus community, because the forum has given me so much inspiration, that i try to give something 
back to the community. But i am not a modder, so I dont want to change him anymore, because i have spend many many 
hours to give him the kender-look, although the only race i found to create this look was  the dwemer race. Feel free to modify him further.

Please keep in mind: This is only a simple savegame of a character i have createt just for
fun and would like to share it with you. This is no kender race, only dwemer! And: i am no modder.

Tolpan is smaller as the most people, you will meet. He loves colored clothes and his biggest treasure are his many many little and big bags for his founded things ... most of you will say: PREY ! :) Maybe you will try to use a bags-mod.

Tolpan is now level 4 in Riverwood. He is a small Kender (Dwemer: the power looks good to a kender, they are friends of all animals. Tolpan has got the Thief-Stone-Power. He comes with some clothing and leather armor and shield. Weapons: -sorry, there is no Hupack - only Quarterstaff (Immersive Weapons Mod), Sword, Bow, Dagger (clipping is possible, because i have changed the size of Tolpan himself and the size of the weapons and quiver.)

Dont worry, if you see the reference of missing mods. I have installed more as a view of them, but the only mods you need, to make tolpan look like in the screenshots i have noticed here. SKSE and the Editors are very important! Please post your screenshots  with a start of Tolpan without this modules - i have never tested it. 

Have a lot of fun with my firsst posted savegame. I hope, you have much fun with Tolpan :)

Please comment and endorse if you like him :) 

Drangonlance:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dragonlance

Kender:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kender


The mods are installed on my skyrim (Awesome mods. All Credits go to that wonderful modders): 

skse_1_06_09 for Skyrim 1.8.151.0 
http://skse.silverlock.org/

RaceMenu by Expired
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D29624

Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D12951

XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356

Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815Fine  

improved skyrim eyes by missjennabee
http://www.loverslab.com/topic/13302-improved-eyes-skyrim-by-missjennabee/

For the clothes-texture in the screenshots:
Elaborate Textiles - NPC Clothing Retexture by Miss Obsidienne
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19826

Recommended:

Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438

For the Quarterstaff: Immersive Weapons by Hothtrooper44 - Ironman5000 - Eckss 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644

Maybe try (not tested jet, but sounds good for a kender)
Quarterstaff by JZBai
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25431/?tab=3&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D25431
author: NexusLeo
